hiveArticle.title: Seek the light and find a way - Part 2
hiveArticle.body:
### Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
###

This image was taken last night while going home in Bangalore, India. There is only one light on the street. I have tried to keep the focus on the flower. Taken from a mobile camera.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQeFK2QsQMF9ESgNFpyUr9SK2GcPSW23bBYi2KVSQuYNy/image.png)

### Check Out [Seek the light and find a way - Part 1](https://steemit.com/photo/@codingdefined/seek-the-light-and-find-a-way)

# Upvote, Follow, Resteem @codingdefined
